articles.author: FOX 5 DC
articles.title: Virginia pharmacy incorrectly administered COVID-19 vaccine to children ages 5 to 11 - FOX 5 DC
articles.description: The Virginia Department of Health has confirmed that a pharmacy in Loudoun County incorrectly administered the COVID-19 vaccine formulated for those 12 years and older to children aged 5-11 years old.
articles.content: LOUDOUN COUNTY, Va. (FOX 5 DC) - The Virginia Department of Health has confirmed that a pharmacy in Loudoun County incorrectly administered the COVID-19 vaccine formulated for those 12 years and olde… [+1371 chars]
